name: ID3v2 Audio Text Tools
short_description: Audio Text Tools allow authors to add audible metadata to their audio files, primarily for the benefit of the visually impaired. The information is embedded using a new ID3v2 ATXT frame, defined in an addendum to the ID3v2 specifications.
